document.full_text: american desiree davila came into monday's boston marathon relatively unheralded but her near-victory gave the united states something to cheer about on a day when african runners swept the men's and women's races.
document.title: u.s. runners enjoy best showing in years at boston
lines_and_colors: american desiree davila came into monday's boston marathon relatively unheralded but her near-victory gave the united states something to cheer about on a day when african runners swept the men's and women's races.
